title: Disconnected from URF pVp
body:
Has anyone else been disconnected constantly from games especially URF? I've played roughly 6 games today and four out of them, I was dc'ed. Then I entered the game again and realised everyone else was also dc'ed. Has anyone else have these problems? 

Thanks
Apple Phys.

replies.body: Well, URF has since ended. Are you still being disconnected from games?
